action.action-desc: Mr. Clawson of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 to exempt issuers with a total market capitalization of less than $2,000,000,000 from the auditor attestation requirement for internal control assessments.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Get Regulation Out of the Way Act of 2015 or the GROW Act of 2015.

section.header: Additional exemption from auditor attestation to internal control assessments
section.text: Section 404(c) of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 (15 U.S.C. 7262(c)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or;
by striking prepared for an issuer and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:
an issuer that, as of the first day of the fiscal year to which the assessment described in such subsection relates, has a total market capitalization of less than $2,000,000,000.
